attributes.action: Call a general election as we have lost confidence in this government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown i really feel you have lost the confidence of your people as you go ahead with your business as a prime minister without listening to your people.The population of this once great country which is now the laughing stock of the world is tired of your ways. The only way you can stop the recession and bring about confidence in the houing market,fuel prices,food prices is to be a man and step down and bring about change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
